alert.note: Alert for Dearborn; Ohio; Ripley; Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 9:21AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, SOUTHERN RIPLEY, SOUTHWESTERN DEARBORN AND NORTHERN SWITZERLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 945 AM EDT... At 921 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 10 miles east of Vernon, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and frequent cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Locations impacted include... Aurora, Versailles, Dillsboro, Wilmington, Pleasant, Hartford, Fairview, Mount Sinai, Center Square, Aberdeen, Rexville, Pate, Cold Springs, Benham, Avonburg, New Marion, Farmers Retreat, Bear Branch, Friendship and East Enterprise. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
